name: ListFormatStyle.ListType
desc: A type that describes whether the returned list contains cumulative or alternative elements.

items.name: typealias ListFormatStyle.ListType.RawValue
items.desc: The raw type that represents values for all cases.

items.name: init(from: Decoder)
items.desc: Creates a new instance by decoding from the given decoder, when the type’s RawValue is Int.

items.name: init?(rawValue: Int)
items.desc: Creates a new instance with the specified raw value.

items.name: var hashValue: Int
items.desc: The hash value of the enumeration.

items.name: var rawValue: Int
items.desc: The corresponding value of the raw type.

items.name: func encode(to: Encoder)
items.desc: Encodes this value into the given encoder, when the type’s RawValue is Int.

items.name: func hash(into: inout Hasher)
items.desc: Hashes the essential components of this value by feeding them into the given hasher.

items.name: static func != (ListFormatStyle<Style, Base>.ListType, ListFormatStyle<Style, Base>.ListType) -> Bool
items.desc: Returns a Boolean value that indicates whether two values are not equal.
